content: with this pattern you will be able to make as many baby octopi as you would like this is the perfect project for beginner crocheters you will receive two pdf english & french difficulty beginner skills required crocheting in spiral magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet stitch bobble stitch increasing and decreasing materials about 13g of bulky weight yarn i used premier yarns- parfait chunky two 12 mm safety eyes 4 50 mm crochet hook polyester fiberfill for stuffing yarn needle scissors stitch marker final size they are about 6 5 cm 2 5 high when made with indicated yarn copyright © 2023 content of this document may not be copied reproduced altered published or distributed in any way you may sell finished products made with this pattern provided credit to all from jade
